## ObserverInfo type

Normailized observer info

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ObserverInfo = Record<ComponentName, ObserverValue[]>;
```

## Example


```typescript
{
  Transform: [{ prop: ['size'], deep: false }],
  OtherComponent: [{ prop: ['style', 'transform'], deep: true }]
}

```
